tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE leads (
  lead_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  company VARCHAR(100),
  job_title VARCHAR(50),
  industry VARCHAR(50),
  buyer_persona VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE buyer_personas (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  company VARCHAR(100),
  persona_category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE lead_information (
  lead_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  company VARCHAR(100),
  job_title VARCHAR(50),
  industry VARCHAR(100),
  lead_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE leads (
    lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_name VARCHAR(50),
    lead_email VARCHAR(100),
    lead_phone VARCHAR(20),
    lead_interest VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Leads (
    lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_name VARCHAR(50),
    lead_email VARCHAR(100),
    lead_phone VARCHAR(20),
    lead_source VARCHAR(50),
    lead_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Leads (
 lead_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 lead_name VARCHAR(50),
 lead_email VARCHAR(50),
 lead_phone VARCHAR(15),
 lead_segment VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Buyer_Personas (
 persona_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 persona_name VARCHAR(50),
 persona_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Segmentation (
 segment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 segment_name VARCHAR(50),
 segment_criteria TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Leads_Buyer_Personas (
 lead_id UUID,
 persona_id UUID,
 PRIMARY KEY (lead_id, persona_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (lead_id) REFERENCES Leads(lead_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (persona_id) REFERENCES Buyer_Personas(persona_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Leads_Segmentation (
 lead_id UUID,
 segment_id UUID,
 PRIMARY KEY (lead_id, segment_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (lead_id) REFERENCES Leads(lead_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES Segmentation(segment_id)
)
